name: Client Service API
description: Sync client data with Salesforce, HubSpot, Karbon, or any CRM. Build two-way workflows so contact updates and address changes flow automatically between systemsâ€”eliminating duplicate data entry.
useCase: Build automated onboarding workflows that create clients in ProConnect when they're added to your CRM. Sync address changes instantly across all platforms.
logicFlow: 1. Authenticate with API key â†’ 2. Add or update client data â†’ 3. Sync with external systems â†’ 4. Validate data integrity â†’ 5. Maintain consistency across platforms

endpoints.description: List all clients with optional filtering

parameters.name: lastUpdated
parameters.description: Filter clients updated after specified date

endpoints.description: Get detailed information about a specific client
Archive or delete a client record

name: Engagement Service API
description: Track tax return status, e-file progress, and project milestones in real-time. Integrate with Tableau, Power BI, or project management tools to visualize pipelines and automate status updatesâ€”transforming data into actionable insights.
useCase: Create live dashboards showing all returns by status and e-file stage. Trigger automated notifications when engagements reach key milestones or deadlines approach.
logicFlow: 1. Query engagement data â†’ 2. Filter by year, status, or project type â†’ 3. Pull return and plan details â†’ 4. Integrate with BI tools â†’ 5. Automate reporting workflows

endpoints.description: List all engagements with filtering options

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by engagement status (draft, in-progress, complete)

parameters.name: efileStatus
parameters.description: Filter by e-file status (pending, transmitted, accepted, rejected)

endpoints.description: Get detailed engagement information including returns, projects, and plans
Get all tax returns associated with an engagement
Get project details for a specific engagement

name: Import Service API
description: Pull tax data from payroll systems (ADP, Paychex) or accounting software (QuickBooks, Xero) directly into engagements. Integrate with OCR tools to extract scanned document data and populate returns automaticallyâ€”cutting data entry time by 80%.
useCase: Automatically import W-2 data from payroll providers into tax returns. Build integrations that pull prior-year return data and pre-populate current year engagements.
logicFlow: 1. Connect to data source â†’ 2. Map data fields to engagement structure â†’ 3. Validate imported data â†’ 4. Import into ProConnect â†’ 5. Confirm successful import

endpoints.description: Import data into a specific engagement

parameters.name: dataType
parameters.description: Type of data being imported (forms, client-data, prior-year)

endpoints.description: Validate import data before committing to engagement
Get import history and status for an engagement

name: Export Service API
description: Export engagement data and calculations to analytics platforms, document management systems, or custom tools. Automatically archive completed returns, push data to advisory planning software, or generate Excel reportsâ€”making ProConnect data work everywhere.
useCase: Export calculated tax data to financial planning software for advisory services. Automatically archive completed returns to SharePoint or document management systems.
logicFlow: 1. Select engagement or data set â†’ 2. Choose export format (JSON, CSV, PDF) â†’ 3. Specify data fields or calculations â†’ 4. Export data â†’ 5. Integrate with downstream systems

endpoints.description: Export engagement data and calculated values

parameters.name: dataFields
parameters.description: Specific fields to include in export

endpoints.description: Export forms and schedules as PDFs
Export data from multiple engagements at once
